REUTERS.UNKNOWN: L C f2435 reute u f BC-TX/W-OKLA-FEEDLOT-CAT 04-07 0076

TEXT.TITLE: TX/W OKLA FEEDLOT CATTLE STDY/UP 0.50 DLR-USDA
TEXT.BODY: slaughter steers were fully steady and heifers steady to 0.50 dlr higher in moderate trade, the usda said. Feedlots reported fairly good interest and inquiry from buying sources. Sales on 6,800 steers and 2,400 heifers. week to date 48,900 head. steers - good and mostly choice 2-3 1025-1150 lbs 69.50-70.00. heifers - good and mostly choice 2-3 925-1025 lbs 68.00-68.50. Reuter
